.app-header {
    background-color:#fff;
}

.app-header .logo {
    display:block;
    width:112px;
    height:24px;
    float:left;
    background:url('data:image/png;base64,') center center no-repeat;
    background-size:100%;
    margin-top:7px;
    margin-right:15px;
}

.logo-neartext {
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:19px;
    padding-left:15px;
    line-height:40px;
    font-family:Boing-Bold,'Arial Black',sans-serif;
    position:relative;
    margin-right:25px;
}

.logo-neartext:before {
    content:"";
    display:inline-block;
    height:20px;
    position:absolute;
    top:11px;
    left:0;
    border-left:1px #ccc solid;
    
}

.app-header .primary-nav {
    float:left;
}

.app-header .secondary-nav {
    float:right;
}

.app-header nav a:not(.btn) {
    display:inline-block;
    font-size:15px;
    color:#111;
    line-height:40px;
    padding:0 15px;
    vertical-align:middle;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.app-header nav a:not(.btn):hover {
    color:#222;
}

.app-header nav a.active {
    color:#00a63f;
    color:#222;
    font-weight:700;
}


/* Language Dropdown */

.select-language {
    vertical-align: top;
    font-size:12px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
}


.app-nav .select-language &gt; a {
    color:#fff !important;
    display:inline-block;
    line-height:70px !important;
     font-size:12px !important;
    font-family:Arial,"Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,sans-serif;
    font-weight:700 !important;
    vertical-align:middle;
    height:auto;

    padding-top:0 !important;
    padding-bottom:0 !important;
    background:0;
    padding-right:0 !important;
}

.select-language &gt; a:before {
    content: '\e305';
    font-size: 16px;
    color: inherit;
    font-family: uxfont;
    line-height: inherit;
    vertical-align: top;
    margin-right: 7px;
    font-weight: 400;
}

.select-language &gt; a:after {
    content: '\e255';
    color: inherit;
    font-family: uxfont;
    font-size: 10px;
    font-weight: 400;
    margin-left: 12px;
    vertical-align: top;
    position: relative;
    top:-1px;
}

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu {
    top:60px;
    right:0;
    padding-right:0;
}

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu:before {
    right:60px;
    background: none;
    border-left: 8px solid transparent;
    border-right: 8px solid transparent;
    border-bottom: 8px solid #f7f7f7;
}

.app-nav .select-language .overflow {
    width:200px;
    max-height:350px;
    overflow: visible;

}

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu { border: 0; border-radius: 0; }

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu a {
    line-height:normal;
    display:block;
    color:#606060;
    padding:15px 0 0 0;
    font-size:12px;
    height: auto;
}

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu a:first-of-type {
    padding-top:0;
}

.app-nav .select-language .dropdown-menu a.active {
    color:#00a63f !important;
    text-decoration:underline;
}





/* Secondary nav */

.app-header .secondary-nav a:not(.btn) {
    font-size:15px;
    font-family:Boing-Bold,'Arial Black',sans-serif;
}

.app-header .secondary-nav .user-menu &gt; a:before {
    content:'\e004';
	font-size:17px;
	color:inherit;
	font-family:uxfont;
	line-height:inherit;
	vertical-align:top;
	margin-right:7px;
	font-weight:400;
}

.app-header .secondary-nav .user-menu &gt; a {
    display:inline-block;
    padding-top:0;
    line-height:40px;
    background:0;
    padding-right:0;
}

.app-header .secondary-nav .user-menu &gt; a:after {
    content: '\e255';
    color: inherit;
    font-family: uxfont;
    font-size: 10px;
    font-weight: 400;
    margin-left: 12px;
    vertical-align: top;
    position: relative;
    top: .1em;
}


.app-header .secondary-nav .add {
    padding-left:22px;
    
    background:url('data:image/png;base64,') left center no-repeat;
    background-size:12px 12px;
}

.secondary-nav .avatar {
    display:inline-block;
    
    width:30px;
    height:40px;

}

.secondary-nav .avatar img {
    width:100%;
    height:auto;

    border-radius:6px;
    
}

/* User Menu Dropdown */

.user-menu .dropdown-content {
    top:50px;
    left:auto;
    right:0;
    min-width:250px;
    max-width:350px;

    z-index:10002;
}

.user-menu .btn:last-child {
    margin-top:0;
}

.user-menu .dropdown-content:before {
    left:auto;
    right:55px;
}

.user-menu h5 {
    margin-bottom:0;
}



.user-menu h5 + p {
    margin-top:5px;
    margin-bottom:10px;
}

.user-menu-links {
    border-top:1px #e2e2e2 solid;
    margin:25px 0;
}

.user-menu-links a {
    display:block !important;
    padding:10px 0 10px 0 !important;
    color:#4664c5 !important;
    height:auto !important;
    line-height:normal !important;
    border-bottom:1px #e2e2e2 solid;
    font-weight:700 !important;
    font-family:Arial,"Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,sans-serif !important;
}

    background:url('data:image/png;base64,') 5px center no-repeat;

}

.user-menu-links a.global-alerts {
    background:url('data:image/png;base64,') 5px center no-repeat;
    background-size:16px 17px;
}

.user-menu-links a.api {
    background:url('data:image/png;base64,') 7px center no-repeat;

.user-menu .username {
    max-width:100%;
    -ms-text-overflow: ellipsis;
    -o-text-overflow: ellipsis;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    overflow:hidden;
    white-space:nowrap;
}

.link {
    padding:0 10px 0 0 !important;
    height:auto !important;
    color:#4664c5 !important;
    margin-top:-65px;
    background-color:#f7f7f7;
    
}


/* App Nav */

.app-nav {
    background-color:#00a63f;
    border-bottom:5px #d1d1d1 solid;
}

.app-nav .wrap &gt; a {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px!important;
    color: #fff !important;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;;
    padding:23px 20px 0 20px !important;
    position: relative;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height:normal !important;
    float:left;
    font-family:Boing-Bold,'Arial Black',sans-serif;
    
}

.app-nav .wrap &gt; a:hover {
    background-color:#02c54c;
}

.app-nav .wrap &gt; a.active:hover {
    background-color:transparent;
}

.app-nav .wrap &gt; a.active:after {
    content:"";
    display:block;
    position:absolute;
    bottom:0;
    left:0;
    width:100%;
    height:5px;
    background-color:#fff;
}
